name: eegeo.js
description: A JavaScript API for beautiful 3D maps

scripts.build-dist: npm run clean && mkdir dist && browserify -s eeGeo src/eegeo.js > dist/eegeo.js
scripts.build-min: npm run build-dist && uglifyjs -c -m < dist/eegeo.js > dist/eegeo.min.js
scripts.watch: npm run build-dist && watchify -s eeGeo src/eegeo.js -o dist/eegeo.js -v --debug

author: eeGeo
